summary: This document is a certificate of existence issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, confirming that Southern Financial LLC is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands. It states that the company has been active since February 25, 2013, and has paid all applicable fees.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter certifies the existence of Southern Financial LLC and affixes his seal to the document.

keyFacts: Southern Financial LLC filed Articles of Organization on February 25, 2013.
The company is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The duration of the Limited Liability Company is perpetual.
The company has paid all applicable fees to date.
No Articles of Termination have been filed by the company.
